data.title: Attorney Nicholas Brown
data.meta_description: Nick has successfully represented clients in numerous civil litigation matters. He serves clients in personal injury, third-party insurance, and premises liability matters. After graduating with honors from the University of Maine School of Law, he served as a law clerk for the Honorable Janis Graham Jack at the United States District Court for the Southern District of Texas. After his clerkship, Nick has dedicated his practice to helping people who are injured from needless acts of negligence and carelessness.
data.text:
Biography Overview

Nick has successfully represented clients in numerous civil litigation matters. He serves clients in personal injury, third-party insurance, and premises liability matters. After graduating with honors from the University of Maine School of Law, he served as a law clerk for the Honorable Janis Graham Jack at the United States District Court for the Southern District of Texas. After his clerkship, Nick has dedicated his practice to helping people who are injured from needless acts of negligence and carelessness. Nick's attention to detail and hands-on approach have allowed him to consistently obtain favorable results for his clients.
